issue.title: [R] DuckDB has not yet released 0.2.8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13453](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13453). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With ARROW-12688 we are depending on a yet-to-be released version of duckdb. This causes R CMD CHECK --as-cran to fail since the version is not yet released (even though it is merely a suggest).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13453?focusedCommentId=17388186) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10807
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10807>
